AboutPage.metaDescription: Menya byinshi kuri Grace & Carry, amateka yacu, n'intego yacu.
AboutPage.journeyParagraph1: Murakaza neza kuri Grace & Carry, ahantu muhuriye n'ubwiza bwatoranyijwe n'imideri idashira igihe. Byavutse kubera urukundo rw'imideri n'icyifuzo cyo guha ubushobozi, iduka ryacu rito ritanga amahitamo yatoranyijwe y'imyenda, inkweto, ibikoresho, n'ibindi bifasha mu buzima.
AboutPage.journeyParagraph2: Twizera ko imideri irenga kuba imyenda gusa; ni uburyo bwo kwigaragaza, kwigirira icyizere, n'ubwiza. Ibicuruzwa byacu bihitwamo neza kugira ngo bigaragaze ubwiza bw'igitsina gore bugezweho, twemeza ko buri gicuruzwa gifite ireme n'imiterere nziza.
AboutPage.journeyParagraph3: Nubwo umutima wacu uri mu kwizihiza imideri y'abagore, twakira buri wese. Turimo kwaguka buhoro buhoro dushyiramo amahitamo yatoranyijwe y'abagabo, kugira ngo buri wese abone ibimubereye. Muri Grace & Carry, duharanira gutanga uburambe bwo guhaha bwihariye kandi bugerwaho, bwuzuyemo ibitekerezo bishya n'imiterere yihariye.
AboutPage.visitParagraph: Idika ryacu rito riri mu mutima wa Kigali, u Rwanda. Turagutumira kureba ibicuruzwa byacu kuri interineti cyangwa kutwandikira.
AboutPage.founderBio: Nelly yashinze Grace & Carry afite icyerekezo cyo guhuza ubwiza no kuboneka, agenga ahantu imiterere ihura n'ireme. Urwo akunda ibishushanyo n'ubwitange bwe ku ireme nibyo shingiro ry'iduka ryacu rito.

Footer.brandDescription: Idika ry'imyambaro y'abagore ry'icyubahiro ririmo ibicuruzwa byatoranyijwe by'imyenda, inkweto, ibikoresho, n'ibindi bifasha mu buzima.
Footer.newsletterDescription: Iyandikishe ku kanyamakuru kacu kugira ngo ubone ibyihariye, ibishya byageze, n'ibitekerezo by'imideri.

Header.freeShipping: Kohereza kubuntu ku byatumijwe byose birengeje {amount}

AccountPage.wishlistEmptyText: Bika ibintu ukunda ku rutonde rwawe rw'ibyifuzwa.

CartPage.emptyCartText: Birasa nkaho nta kintu urashyira mu gaseke kawe.

ConfirmationPage.heading: Komande Yemejwe!
ConfirmationPage.emailConfirmationMessage: Imeri y'ibyemezo yoherejwe kuri aderesi yanyu y'imeri.

CollectionsPage.notFoundDescription: Twihanganire, ntitwabashije kubona icyegeranyo gifite iyo ndangamuntu.

LoginPage.heading: Ikaze Wongere
LoginPage.errorMessage: Imeri cyangwa ijambobanga bitari byo. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.

SignupPage.heading: Fungura Konti
SignupPage.subheading: Injira mu muryango wacu w'abakunda imideri
SignupPage.errorRegistrationFailed: Habayeho ikosa mu kwiyandikisha. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.

ForgotPasswordPage.heading: Wibagiwe Ijambobanga?
ForgotPasswordPage.subheading: Injiza aderesi yawe y'imeri kugira ngo ushyireho ijambobanga rishya
ForgotPasswordPage.errorMessage: Habayeho ikosa mu kohereza ifishi. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
ForgotPasswordPage.successMessage: Twohereje umurongo wo gusubizaho ijambobanga kuri aderesi yawe y'imeri. Nyamuneka reba muri imeri zawe maze ukurikize amabwiriza kugira ngo ushyireho ijambobanga rishya.

HomePage.heroParagraph: Vumbura icyegeranyo cyacu gishya cy'imideri ikaze y'umugore w'iki gihe.
HomePage.categoriesParagraph: Shakisha ibicuruzwa byacu ukurikije icyiciro kugira ngo ubone neza icyo ushaka.
HomePage.collectionBannerParagraph: Vumbura icyegeranyo cyacu giheruka cy'impeshyi kirimo imyenda yoroshye, ibishushanyo bihumeka, n'amabara meza meza y'iki gihe.

NotFoundPage.heading: Page Ntabonetse
NotFoundPage.message: Oya! Birasa nkaho page washakaga itabaho cyangwa yimuwe. Reka tugufashe kugaruka mu nzira.

CategoryPage.noProductsDescription: Gerageza guhindura imyungururizo yawe cyangwa ushakishe mu bindi byiciro byacu.

ContactPage.getIntouchParagraph: Turi hano kugufasha ku bibazo byose cyangwa ibikureba ushobora kugira. Itsinda ryacu rya serivisi y'abakiriya riboneka kuva ku wa Mbere kugeza ku wa Gatanu, saa tatu za mu gitondo kugeza saa kumi n'imwe z'umugoroba EST.
ContactPage.callHoursWeekdays: Kuva ku wa Mbere - Ku wa Gatanu: 9am - 5pm EST
ContactPage.callHoursWeekends: Ku wa Gatandatu - Ku Cyumweru: Hafunze
ContactPage.chatDescription: Girana ikiganiro n'itsinda ryacu rya serivisi y'abakiriya mu gihe nyacyo mu masaha y'akazi.
ContactPage.formSuccessMessage: Murakoze kutwandikira. Twakiriye ubutumwa bwanyu kandi tuzabasubiza vuba bishoboka, ubusanzwe mu masaha 24-48 y'akazi.
ContactPage.faqParagraph: Shaka ibisubizo byihuse ku bibazo bikunze kubazwa ku
ContactPage.faq1Question: Ni ubuhe buryo mukoresha mu kohereza ibintu?
ContactPage.faq1Answer: Dutanga uburyo busanzwe, bwihuse, n'ubwo mu ijoro bwo kohereza. Kohereza kubuntu mu buryo busanzwe ku byatumijwe birengeje $100.
ContactPage.faq2Question: Ni ayahe mabwiriza yo gusubiza ibintu?
ContactPage.faq2Answer: Dutanga amabwiriza yo gusubiza mu minsi 30 ku bintu byose bitarambarwa biri mu mimerere yabyo byambere bifite ibirango.
ContactPage.faq3Answer: Dutanga ubuyobozi burambuye bw'ingano ku bicuruzwa byacu byose kugira ngo ugufashe kubona ingano yawe nziza.

customerService.title: Serivisi y'Abakiriya
customerService.helpDescription: Kuri {brandName}, twiyemeje gutanga serivisi nziza y'abakiriya. Itsinda ryacu ryitangiye riri hano kugufasha ku bibazo byose cyangwa ibikureba ushobora kugira.
customerService.emailUsDescription: Twoherereze imeri kandi tuzasubiza mu masaha 24.
customerService.callUsDescription: Itsinda ryacu rya serivisi y'abakiriya riboneka kuva ku wa Mbere kugeza ku wa Gatanu, 9am-5pm EST.
customerService.liveChatDescription: Girana ikiganiro n'itsinda ryacu rya serivisi y'abakiriya mu gihe nyacyo.
customerService.faqDescription: Shaka ibisubizo byihuse ku bibazo byacu bikunze kubazwa cyane. Ku bisobanuro birambuye, nyamuneka sura urupapuro rwacu rwa <faqLink>IBK</faqLink>.
customerService.shippingQuestion: Ni ubuhe buryo mukoresha mu kohereza ibintu?
customerService.shippingAnswer: Dutanga kohereza bisanzwe (iminsi 3-5 y'akazi), kohereza byihuse (iminsi 1-2 y'akazi), na kohereza mu ijoro. Kohereza kubuntu mu buryo busanzwe biboneka ku byatumijwe byose birengeje $100. Ku bindi bisobanuro, nyamuneka sura urupapuro rwacu rwa <shippingLink>Kohereza & Gusubiza</shippingLink>.
customerService.returnPolicyQuestion: Ni ayahe mabwiriza yo gusubiza ibintu?
customerService.returnPolicyAnswer: Dutanga amabwiriza yo gusubiza mu minsi 30 ku bintu byose bitarambarwa biri mu mimerere yabyo byambere bifite ibirango. Ku bindi bisobanuro, nyamuneka sura urupapuro rwacu rwa <shippingLink>Kohereza & Gusubiza</shippingLink>.
customerService.sizeGuideAnswer: Dutanga ubuyobozi burambuye bw'ingano ku bicuruzwa byacu byose. Ku bisobanuro rusange by'ingano, nyamuneka sura urupapuro rwacu rwa <sizeGuideLink>Ubuyobozi bw'Ingano</sizeGuideLink>.
customerService.notFoundDescription: Ntabwo wabonye icyo washakaga? Twandikire mu buryo butaziguye cyangwa usure urupapuro rwacu rwa <faqLink>IBK</faqLink> rurambuye.

faqPage.title: Ibibazo Bikunze Kubazwa
faqPage.intro: Shaka ibisubizo ku bibazo byacu bikunze kubazwa cyane hano hasi. Niba utabonye icyo ushaka, nyamuneka ntuzuyaze <contactLink>kutwandikira</contactLink>.

a1.li1: Shakisha mu byegeranyo byacu maze ushyire ibintu mu gaseke kawe
a1.li2: Kanda ku gashushanyo k'agaseke kugira ngo usuzume ibintu byawe
a1.li4: Injiza amakuru yawe yo koherezaho n'ayo kwishyuriraho
a1.p2: Uzakira imeri y'ibyemezo bya komande igura ryawe rirangiye.

ordering.q2: Ni ubuhe buryo bwo kwishyura mwemera?

a2.li1: Amakarita ya Banki (Credit/Debit) (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover)
a2.p2: Ibikorwa byose by'ubucuruzi birarinzwe kandi birahishwa mu ibanga kubw'umutekano wawe.

ordering.q3: Nashobora guhindura cyangwa guhagarika komande yanjye?
ordering.a3: Ushobora gusaba guhindura cyangwa guhagarika komande yawe mu isaha 1 nyuma yo kuyitanga uhamagaye itsinda ryacu rya serivisi y'abakiriya. Igihe komande yamaze gutunganywa, ntitwakora impinduka cyangwa kuyihagarika. Niba komande yawe yamaze gutunganywa, ushobora gusubiza ibintu umaze kubyakira ukurikije <returnPolicyLink>amabwiriza yacu yo gusubiza</returnPolicyLink>.
ordering.a4: Yego, dutanga amakarita y'impano ya elegitoronike mu biciro bitandukanye. Amakarita y'impano atangwa kuri imeri kandi ashobora gukoreshwa mu gihe cyo kwishyura. Aba ari impano nziza ku nshuti n'umuryango bakunda imideri myiza.

a5.p1: Dukunze gutanga poromosiyo z'ibihe n'amagabanyirizwa yihariye. Kugira ngo ukomeze kumenya amakuru y'ibyo dutanga biheruka:
a5.li3: Fungura konti kugira ngo wakire ibyihariye byagenewe wowe
a5.p2: Tunatanga igabanyirizwa rya 10% kuri komande yawe ya mbere iyo wiyandikishije ku kanyamakuru kacu.

shipping.q1: Ni ubuhe buryo mukoresha mu kohereza n'ibiciro byabyo?

a1.li1: Kohereza Bisanzwe (iminsi 3-5 y'akazi): $9.99 (Ubuntu ku byatumijwe birengeje $100)
a1.p2: Ku bisobanuro birambuye, nyamuneka sura urupapuro rwacu rwa <shippingLink>Kohereza & Gusubiza</shippingLink>.

shipping.q2: Bizatwara igihe kingana iki kugira ngo nakire komande yanjye?
shipping.a2: Komande ubusanzwe zitunganywa mu minsi 1-2 y'akazi. Igihe cyo kugeza giterwa n'uburyo wahisemo bwo kohereza n'aho uri. Nyuma yuko komande yawe yoherejwe, uzakira imeri y'ibyemezo irimo amakuru yo gukurikirana kugira ngo ubashe kumenya aho ipaki yawe igeze.
shipping.a3: Kugeza ubu, twohereza muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika na Kanada. Ku bibazo byerekeye kohereza mu mahanga, nyamuneka <contactLink>twandikire</contactLink> mu buryo butaziguye, kandi tuzakora uko dushoboye ngo tubashe kugufasha.

a4.li1: Ukanda ku murongo wo gukurikirana uri mu imeri yawe y'ibyemezo byo kohereza
a4.li2: Usura igice cya "Amateka ya Komande" muri konti yawe
a4.li3: Uhamagara itsinda ryacu rya serivisi y'abakiriya ufite nomero ya komande yawe

returns.q1: Ni ayahe mabwiriza yo gusubiza ibintu?
returns.a1: Dutanga amabwiriza yo gusubiza mu minsi 30 ku bintu byose bitarambarwa biri mu mimerere yabyo byambere bifite ibirango. Ibicuruzwa biri ku igabanyirizwa n'ibikoresho (imitako, foulards, n'ibindi) bigurwa burundu kandi ntibishobora gusubizwa keretse bifite inenge. Ku bindi bisobanuro, nyamuneka sura urupapuro rwacu rwa <shippingLink>Kohereza & Gusubiza</shippingLink>.

a2.li1: Injira muri konti yawe maze ujye muri "Amateka ya Komande" cyangwa uhamagare itsinda ryacu rya serivisi y'abakiriya
a2.li2: Hitamo ibintu wifuza gusubiza maze ukurikize amabwiriza
a2.li3: Funga ibintu byawe mu mimerere yabyo yambere bifite ibirango
a2.li4: Shyiramo nomero ya komande yawe cyangwa ifishi yo gusubiza
a2.li5: Ohereza ibyo usubiza kuri aderesi yatanzwe ukoresheje uburyo bwo kohereza bushobora gukurikiranwa
a2.p1: Tumaze kwakira no gutunganya ibyo wasubije, uzakira imeri y'ibyemezo, kandi amafaranga yawe azasubizwa.

returns.a3: Kugeza ubu ntabwo dutanga guhindura mu buryo butaziguye. Niba wifuza guhindura igicuruzwa, nyamuneka subiza igicuruzwa cyambere kugira ngo usubizwe amafaranga maze utange komande nshya y'igicuruzwa wifuza. Ibi byemeza ko ubona neza igicuruzwa wifuza mu buryo bwihuse bushoboka.
returns.q4: Bizatwara igihe kingana iki kugira ngo nakire amafaranga yanjye yasubijwe?
returns.a4: Tumaze kwakira no gutunganya ibyo wasubije, gusubizwa kw'amafaranga ubusanzwe gufata iminsi 5-7 y'akazi kugira ngo bigaragare ku buryo wakoresheje mu kwishyura mbere. Igihe gishobora gutandukana bitewe n'ikigo cyawe cy'imari.

a1.p1: Dutanga ubuyobozi burambuye bw'ingano ku bicuruzwa byacu byose. Ku bisobanuro rusange by'ingano, nyamuneka sura urupapuro rwacu rwa <sizeGuideLink>Ubuyobozi bw'Ingano</sizeGuideLink>. Buri rupapuro rw'igicuruzwa runashyiraho amakuru yihariye y'ingano y'icyo gicuruzwa.
a1.p2: Niba uri hagati y'ingano ebyiri, ubusanzwe turagusaba gufata ingano nini kugira ngo wikwize neza.

products.q2: Ni ibihe bikoresho mukoresha mu bicuruzwa byanyu?
products.a2: Duhitamo neza ibikoresho byiza cyane ku bicuruzwa byacu byose. Buri rupapuro rw'igicuruzwa rugaragaza ibikoresho byihariye byakoreshejwe, hamwe n'amabwiriza yo kubifata neza. Twita cyane ku ireme no kuramba mu mahitamo yacu y'ibikoresho.
products.q3: Nafata nte neza ibintu byanjye bya {brandName}?

a3.p1: Amabwiriza yo gufata neza atangwa kuri buri rupapuro rw'igicuruzwa no ku kirango cyo gufata neza kiri kuri buri gicuruzwa. Muri rusange, turagusaba:
a3.li1: Gukurikiza amabwiriza yihariye yo gufata neza kuri buri gicuruzwa
a3.li2: Kumesa intoki ibintu byoroshye cyangwa gukoresha uburyo bworoheje mu mashini
a3.li3: Kwanika ku mwuka iyo bishoboka kugira ngo bigumane ishusho n'ireme ry'umwenda
a3.li4: Kubika ibintu neza kugira ngo bigumane ireme ryabyo

a4.p1: Kuramba ni ingenzi kuri twe. Duhora dukora kugira ngo tunoze imikorere yacu:
a4.li1: Dushaka ibikoresho biramba kandi by'ubuziranenge iyo bishoboka
a4.li2: Tugabanya imyanda mu gupfunyika no mu gutunganya ibicuruzwa byacu
a4.li3: Dukorana n'inganda zubahiriza imikorere myiza y'abakozi
a4.li4: Duteza imbere imirongo y'ibicuruzwa biramba cyane

a1.li1: Kanda ku gashushanyo ka konti hejuru iburyo bw'urubuga rwacu
a1.li3: Injiza aderesi yawe y'imeri maze ushyireho ijambobanga
a1.li5: Kanda "Fungura Konti" kugira ngo urangize igikorwa
a1.p2: Kugira konti bikwemerera gukurikirana komande, kubika ibyo ukunda, no kwihutisha igikorwa cyo kwishyura.

account.a2: Twita cyane ku ibanga ryawe. Amakuru yose bwite arahishwa mu ibanga kandi abitswe mu mutekano. Ntabwo dusangiza amakuru yawe n'abandi batabifitiye uburenganzira. Ku bindi bisobanuro, nyamuneka reba <privacyLink>Amabwiriza y'Ibanga</privacyLink> yacu.
account.q3: Nashobora kwikura ku rutonde rwo koherezwaho imeri?

a3.p1: Yego, ushobora kwikura ku rutonde rwo koherezwaho imeri igihe cyose:
a3.li1: Ukanda ku murongo wa "Kwikura ku rutonde" uri hasi kuri buri meri
a3.li2: Uhindura ibyo uhitamo by'itumanaho muri igenamiterere rya konti yawe
a3.li3: Uhamagara itsinda ryacu rya serivisi y'abakiriya

faqPage.contactButton: Hamagara Itsinda Ryacu rya Serivisi y'Abakiriya

SalePage.pageDescription: Vumbura ibiciro bitangaje ku myambaro yacu y'abagore y'icyubahiro. Ibyo dutanga by'igihe gito, ntucikwe!

ShippingPage.businessDaysNote: * Iminsi y'akazi ni kuva ku wa Mbere kugeza ku wa Gatanu, hatabariwemo iminsi mikuru.
ShippingPage.policyProcessed: Komande zitunganywa kandi zikoherezwa mu minsi 1-2 y'akazi nyuma y'ibyemezo byo kwishyura.
ShippingPage.policyConfirmation: Uzakira imeri y'ibyemezo byo kohereza irimo amakuru yo gukurikirana igihe komande yawe izaba yoherejwe.
ShippingPage.policyLocations: Kugeza ubu twohereza muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika na Kanada. Ku bibazo byerekeye kohereza mu mahanga, nyamuneka <contactLink>twandikire</contactLink>.
ShippingPage.policyDelays: Igihe cyo kohereza gishobora guhinduka mu bihe by'ubucuruzi bwinshi, iminsi mikuru, cyangwa kubera impamvu zitateganijwe.
ShippingPage.policyMultipleItems: Ku makomande arimo ibintu byinshi, dushobora kohereza ibintu ukwabyo kugira ngo twemeze kugeza byihuse cyane.
ShippingPage.trackingEmail: Ukanda ku murongo wo gukurikirana uri mu imeri yawe y'ibyemezo byo kohereza
ShippingPage.trackingAccount: Usura igice cya "Amateka ya Komande" muri <accountLink>konti</accountLink> yawe
ShippingPage.trackingCustomerService: Uhamagara itsinda ryacu rya <customerServiceLink>serivisi y'abakiriya</customerServiceLink> ufite nomero ya komande yawe
ShippingPage.returnPolicy30Days: Dutanga amabwiriza yo gusubiza mu minsi 30 ku bintu byose bitarambarwa biri mu mimerere yabyo byambere bifite ibirango.
ShippingPage.returnPolicyFinalSale: Ibicuruzwa biri ku igabanyirizwa n'ibikoresho (imitako, foulards, n'ibindi) bigurwa burundu kandi ntibishobora gusubizwa keretse bifite inenge.
ShippingPage.returnPolicyDefective: Ibintu bifite inenge cyangwa byangiritse bishobora gusubizwa mu minsi 14 nyuma yo kubyakira.
ShippingPage.returnPolicyShippingCost: Igiciro cyo kohereza ibyasubijwe kiri ku mukiriya, keretse ku bintu bifite inenge cyangwa byoherejwe mu makosa.
ShippingPage.returnPolicyRefundTime: Amafaranga asubizwa azashyirwa ku buryo wakoresheje mu kwishyura mbere mu minsi 5-7 y'akazi nyuma yuko twakiriye kandi tugatunganya ibyo wasubije.
ShippingPage.returnStep1Desc: Injira muri konti yawe maze ujye muri "Amateka ya Komande" cyangwa uhamagare itsinda ryacu rya serivisi y'abakiriya.
ShippingPage.returnStep2Desc: Emeza ko ibintu byose biri mu mimerere yabyo yambere bifite ibirango. Shyiramo nomero ya komande yawe cyangwa ifishi yo gusubiza.
ShippingPage.returnStep3Desc: Koresha uburyo bwo kohereza bushobora gukurikiranwa maze wohereze kuri aderesi yatanzwe mu byemezo byo gusubiza.
ShippingPage.returnStep4Desc: Uzakira imeri igihe ibyo wasubije bimaze gutunganywa kandi amafaranga yawe asubijwe.
ShippingPage.exchangesDescription: Kugeza ubu ntabwo dutanga guhindura mu buryo butaziguye. Niba wifuza guhindura igicuruzwa, nyamuneka subiza igicuruzwa cyambere kugira ngo usubizwe amafaranga maze utange komande nshya y'igicuruzwa wifuza.
ShippingPage.faq1Answer: Komande ubusanzwe zitunganywa kandi zikoherezwa mu minsi 1-2 y'akazi nyuma y'ibyemezo byo kwishyura.
ShippingPage.faq2Question: Nashobora guhindura cyangwa guhagarika komande yanjye?
ShippingPage.faq2Answer: Ushobora gusaba guhindura cyangwa guhagarika komande yawe mu isaha 1 nyuma yo kuyitanga uhamagaye itsinda ryacu rya serivisi y'abakiriya. Igihe komande yamaze gutunganywa, ntitwakora impinduka cyangwa kuyihagarika.
ShippingPage.faq3Question: Bizatwara igihe kingana iki kugira ngo nakire amafaranga yanjye yasubijwe?
ShippingPage.faq3Answer: Tumaze kwakira no gutunganya ibyo wasubije, gusubizwa kw'amafaranga ubusanzwe gufata iminsi 5-7 y'akazi kugira ngo bigaragare ku buryo wakoresheje mu kwishyura mbere. Igihe gishobora gutandukana bitewe n'ikigo cyawe cy'imari.
ShippingPage.faq4Question: Bigenze bite niba igicuruzwa cyanjye kigezeho cyangiritse?
ShippingPage.faq4Answer: Niba igicuruzwa cyawe kigezeho cyangiritse cyangwa gifite inenge, nyamuneka hamagara itsinda ryacu rya serivisi y'abakiriya mu minsi 14 nyuma yo kucyakira. Tuzaguha amabwiriza yo gusubiza igicuruzwa no kohereza ikindi gisimbura.
ShippingPage.contactPrompt: Ufite ibindi bibazo ku kohereza cyangwa gusubiza? Turi hano kugufasha.

SizeGuidePage.introParagraph: Kubona ingano ikubereye neza ni ingenzi haba ku kwisanzura no ku mideri. Koresha ubuyobozi bwacu burambuye bw'ingano kugira ngo umenye ingano yawe nziza ku bicuruzwa byose bya {brandName}. Niba uri hagati y'ingano ebyiri, ubusanzwe turagusaba gufata ingano nini kugira ngo wikwize neza.
SizeGuidePage.assistanceText: Itsinda ryacu rya serivisi y'abakiriya riboneka kugufasha ku bibazo byose by'ingano. <contactLink>Twandikire</contactLink> kugira ngo ubone ubufasha bwihariye.
SizeGuidePage.footwearNote: * Kugira ngo bikubere neza, turagusaba gupima ikirenge cyawe ukareba uburebure bw'ikirenge mu nci cyangwa santimetero.
SizeGuidePage.tipMeasureEvening: Pima ibirenge byawe nimugoroba kuko aribwo bikunze kuba binini kurusha.
SizeGuidePage.tipWearSocks: Hagarara igihe upima kandi wambare ubwoko bw'amasogisi uteganya kuzambarana n'inkweto.
SizeGuidePage.tipLargerFoot: Niba ikirenge kimwe ari kinini kurusha ikindi, geringaniriza ku kirenge kinini.
SizeGuidePage.tipHeelsStretch: Ku nkweto ndende n'iz'ibirori, bikwiriye ko zigufata neza kuko uruhu ruzaguka gato uko zirambarwa.
SizeGuidePage.tipBootsSpace: Ku nkweto z'amabote n'izifunze imbere, emeza ko hari umwanya ungana n'urwara rw'igikumwe hagati y'ino ryawe rirerire n'impera y'urukweto.
SizeGuidePage.measureBustDesc: Pima uzengurutse igice kinini cyane cy'igado cyawe, ugumisha metero irambuye hasi.
SizeGuidePage.measureWaistDesc: Pima uzengurutse urukiryi rwawe rusanzwe, arirwo gace gato cyane k'igihimba cyawe.
SizeGuidePage.measureHipsDesc: Pima uzengurutse igice kinini cyane cy'itako ryawe, ubusanzwe nko mu nci 8 munsi y'urukiryi rwawe.
SizeGuidePage.measureInseamDesc: Pima uhereye hagati y'amaguru ugeza hasi ku kagombambari.
SizeGuidePage.measureFootLengthDesc: Hagarara ku rupapuro maze ushushanye uzengurutse ikirenge cyawe. Pima uburebure uhereye ku gatsitsino ugeza ku ino rirerire.
SizeGuidePage.measureFootWidthDesc: Pima igice kigari cyane cy'ikirenge cyawe, ubusanzwe hejuru y'umupira w'ikirenge.
SizeGuidePage.proTipDesc: Niba uri hagati y'ingano ebyiri cyangwa utazi neza, itsinda ryacu rya serivisi y'abakiriya ryishimiye gutanga inama zihariye z'ingano ku gicuruzwa icyo ari cyo cyose.
SizeGuidePage.finalPrompt: Ugifite ibibazo ku kubona ingano yawe nziza?
